Footnote: Refugees includes people in refugee-like situations
The total figure includes 200,000 persons originating from Myanmar in a refugee-like situation. The Government of Bangladesh estimates the population to be between 300,000 and 500,000.

The total figure at the end of 2015 includes 243,000 persons in Bangladesh originating from Myanmar in a refugee-like situation. The Government of Bangladesh estimates the population to be between 300,000 and 500,000.
